location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to James Farish, Acting Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is explaining, as per the commands of the Bombay Government dated 21 September 1811, that the Residency account books were ready to be transmitted to Bombay, but that this was delayed as no vessel was available to ship them.
